room_title: Escape room "Curtain Call" by Ozark Escape in Fayetteville (AR)
room_address: 509 W. Spring Street, Suite 140, Fayetteville, AR 72701
room_description:
THE GREAT ILLUSIONIST, SORCERO, HAS BEEN PERFORMING INCREASINGLY BREATHTAKING & DANGEROUS ILLUSIONS.
 
ATTEMPTING TO EMBODY THE SPIRIT OF THE DRAGON, BACKSTAGE HE NEEDS YOUR HELP.
 
Backstage in Sorcero's chambers, while he is bewildering the audience, you must work your way through the props and trickery. Figuring out what is real and what is illusion, you need to hurry to assist Sorcero on stage.
 
The world of magic can be as deadly as it is amazing. And the powerful dragon spirit waits for no man...
